readable.title: 448257345_ce149c2ea6
readable.content: A dog is staring at the food in the plate of a person eating . A person holding a dog while they eat . A person is eating a plate of pasta with a black and brown dog on his or her lap . A person is eating pasta , while a dog is watching . Someone in a blue and white striped sweater is eating and the dog next to them is interested in their food .
